item.title: Blog Reboot
item.description: Reboot My PC crashed some time ago, and I had to reinstall everything. At the same, work load just gotten a lot heavier for the past 2 years so I never found the time to properly set up my workstation again. I was also kind-of lazy to set up Jekyll again, and started to look for alternatives. Then I was introduced to Hugo, which seemed like it didn’t require as much maintenance as Jekyll.
